metadata.synopsis: Captain commands for the door to be closed.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Plays after the CaptainSpeaksToTemplar dialog is over.

0.speaker: Kith'rak Therezzyn
0.text: Shut those doors - this is not a public forum.
0.context: NodeContext: Snappy, angry; loud enough for someone to hear on the other side of the room
